about_the_game:
Introducing the NewBee x IRC Drone DLC for FPV.SkyDive simulator! Take your FPV experience to a new level with this thrilling expansion.

This DLC expands your adventures with a micro drone racing pack, featuring specially designed gates for micro drones, an indoor gym map for precise maneuvers, and a parking garage to test your skills in tight spaces. The NewBee x IRC Drone DLC provides everything you need for the ultimate FPV experience!

WHOOP DRONE APPROVED BY NEWBEE



The Whoop drone included in the DLC package is a digital twin of the NewBeeDrone AcroBee65 BLV4 BNF Ghost drone. It's an excellent choice for those just starting their drone journey, providing a gentle learning curve to build essential skills and confidence.

MICRO DRONE RACING PACK




The micro drone racing pack included with the DLC contains:
  • Eight micro drone tracks
  • Specially designed gates for indoor racing and gates that can be used in the Track Builder DLC to create custom tracks
  • A Gymnasium map specifically designed for micro drone racing

ADDITIONAL PARKING GARAGE MAP




A parking garage is perfect for honing your skills in tight and challenging spaces. This map offers a unique environment to test and improve your precision flying.

With the Whoop drone, players have the freedom to take freestyle flight on every* map plus an additional parking garage & Gymnasium that comes with this DLC package.

DRONE SPECIFICATIONS

  • Maximum speed: 50km/h
  • Drone size: 65mm
  • Total weight of the drone without battery: 24.8g
  • Flight Controller: BeeBrain BLV4 GHOST build in VTX and Ghost Receiver
  • Frame: Cockroach65 Brushless Frame
  • Motors: Flow 0802 27000kv Double Ball Bearing Brushless motor
  • Propellers: Azi Tri-Blade 31mm Propeller
  • Camera: BeeEye Camera
  • Canopy: Goober Canopy v1

* Drone can be used on all included free maps available in the simulator as well as additional DLC maps that need to be purchased.

package_groups.title: Buy FPV.SkyDive - NewBee x IRC Drone

short_description: Experience the Whoop approved by NewBee, this Whoop drone presents a digital twin of the AcroBee65 BLV4 BNF Ghost, designed for all levels of experience. The package includes a parking lot map, the perfect addition for this type of drone!
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain
